entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet restore --force-evaluate deletes parts of packages.lock.json #48723
  • Created New Blank .NET MAUI App but Building Leads to Missing Android Workload But Workload Is Installed #48664

Updated

  • dotnet build --help does not show Property option `--property` #48742
  • CanIgnoreTemplateGroupsWithConstraints flaky test failing in CI #46212
  • dotnet watch - Failure in DeleteSubfolder test with polling #46454
  • aspnetcore build failure - Child node 7 exited prematurely #46398
  • [dotnet watch] Cannot open project Lib.fsproj because extension fsproj is not associated with a language #46378
  • Build failure in VMR Vertical Build Windows_x64: Downloading vswhere - Process cannot access sdk.txt because it is being used by another process #45809
  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
    10.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
    10.0.1xx
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    10.0.1xx
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
    10.0.1xx
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
    10.0.1xx
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
    10.0.1xx
  • .slnx file format is not ignored #48728
  • [NETSDKE2E][VMR][Regression]CoreFX symbols are missing for IL symbols. #48716
  • [NETSDKE2E][VMR].NET 10 Preview 4 Binaries could not work normally on Alpine Linux. #48513

PullRequests

Created

  • Local dev props #48739
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48711
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48741
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Ignore .slnx #48729
  • sln-add: Refactor logic for autogenerating solution folders #48726
    Area-CLI
  • ensure that single-rid container publishes populate all container information #48584
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Downgrade implicit version to unblock workloads testing from main #48704
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix launch profile test failure #48713
    Area-Infrastructure
